title: New: Jamie Isaac – I Will Be Cold Soon (Demo)
content:
Someone please explain to me how Jamie Isaac isn’t a household name yet? With a stunning collection of tracks made available in 2011, and a couple of tasters already out this year ahead of his debut EP release, it’s growing increasingly apparent that this kid has talent in abundance.

New demo I Will Be Cold Soon is an elegant ballad, with touches of Perfume Genius and (dare I say it) James Blake, swirling majestically throughout. The melancholic piano resounds knowingly, whilst Isaac’s vocals drown in a sea of stirring reverb. Check it out below.
